title: Installation issue: llvm@11.1.0  `ld fatal error: cannot use --plugin`
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

When I try to install llvm on my wsl, it reports the following error

```
$ spack install llvm ^python+tkinter
...
==> Installing llvm-11.1.0-vumv7pwdrryveletq77q4gyajjdzyau6
==> No binary for llvm-11.1.0-vumv7pwdrryveletq77q4gyajjdzyau6 found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /home/yzz/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/53/53a0719f3f4b0388013cfffd7b10c7d5682eece1929a9553c722348d1f866e79.tar.gz
==> No patches needed for llvm
==> llvm: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    'cmake' '-G' 'Unix Makefiles' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:STRING=/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/llvm-11.1.0-vumv7pwdrryveletq77q4gyajjdzyau6' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=Release' '-DCMAKE_INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION:BOOL=OFF' '-DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE:BOOL=ON' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH:BOOL=OFF' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH:STRING=/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/llvm-11.1.0-vumv7pwdrryveletq77q4gyajjdzyau6/lib;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/llvm-11.1.0-vumv7pwdrryveletq77q4gyajjdzyau6/lib64;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/binutils-2.36.1-jdrlygkjalsohe2yhdlchwnixe4sngxo/lib;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/gettext-0.21-kzbovc5ai2zqs3afizlvtql2fs555g3i/lib;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/bzip2-1.0.8-xn4fe3zt3okv3rl24tscfuym3xxzvgll/lib;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/libiconv-1.16-af5tdk6ilv6mah2ntgb5odryvlosijnz/lib;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/libxml2-2.9.10-oxpxbrpqqca5hjh6blb4qv5chqqv3ykv/lib;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/xz-5.2.5-4kcnj3oypwyyr3o46ipejwuk3x5gzrar/lib;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/zlib-1.2.11-sl7m27mzkbejtkrajigj3a3m37ygv4u2/lib;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/ncurses-6.2-buo3tjmtuimvtofgncv6w3lzg2gmouqu/lib;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/hwloc-2.4.1-22nggxk25tnksphk3qrpheamaic7263t/lib;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/libpciaccess-0.16-fueeuyvb37exbhwxkgte4kurdjyxli5u/lib;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/libedit-3.1-20210216-jeuw6ye4c4lw6ve3fpd5npitsttk4aoe/lib;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/pcre-8.44-3n453slowncdm66pdxxcmojvozeua7ea/lib;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/z3-4.8.9-7xys7rwwd2yyk3b73ez4dsonwgisap6d/lib' '-DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH:STRING=/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/cmake-3.20.1-z7aeuqkurkxlj4fna7p6q6sjstemhvea;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/python-3.8.9-7d6yhosuidhsuzcxeayt2jcvmg5rs2ia;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/pkgconf-1.7.4-s76yqqcwccjlv3x64qq7io5hfnbs5xz7;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/z3-4.8.9-7xys7rwwd2yyk3b73ez4dsonwgisap6d;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/perl-data-dumper-2.173-irsypwsf2tr7szejeffvds7slhew3qmd;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/hwloc-2.4.1-22nggxk25tnksphk3qrpheamaic7263t;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/ncurses-6.2-buo3tjmtuimvtofgncv6w3lzg2gmouqu;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/swig-4.0.2-poqpp6gmolgikadcpbbbpfekkhku6abu;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/libedit-3.1-20210216-jeuw6ye4c4lw6ve3fpd5npitsttk4aoe;/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/binutils-2.36.1-jdrlygkjalsohe2yhdlchwnixe4sngxo' '-DLLVM_REQUIRES_RTTI:BOOL=ON' '-DLLVM_ENABLE_RTTI:BOOL=ON' '-DLLVM_ENABLE_EH:BOOL=ON' '-DCLANG_DEFAULT_OPENMP_RUNTIME:STRING=libomp' '-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE:PATH=/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/python-3.8.9-7d6yhosuidhsuzcxeayt2jcvmg5rs2ia/bin/python3.8' '-DLIBOMP_USE_HWLOC:BOOL=ON' '-DLIBOMP_HWLOC_INSTALL_DIR=/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/hwloc-2.4.1-22nggxk25tnksphk3qrpheamaic7263t' '-DPython3_EXECUTABLE=/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/python-3.8.9-7d6yhosuidhsuzcxeayt2jcvmg5rs2ia/bin/python3.8' '-DCUDA_TOOLKIT_ROOT_DIR:PATH=IGNORE' '-DCUDA_SDK_ROOT_DIR:PATH=IGNORE' '-DCUDA_NVCC_EXECUTABLE:FILEPATH=IGNORE' '-DLIBOMPTARGET_DEP_CUDA_DRIVER_LIBRARIES:STRING=IGNORE' '-DLLDB_ENABLE_PYTHON:Bool=OFF' '-DLLVM_BINUTILS_INCDIR=/home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/binutils-2.36.1-jdrlygkjalsohe2yhdlchwnixe4sngxo/include' '-DLINK_POLLY_INTO_TOOLS:Bool=ON' '-DLLVM_TARGETS_TO_BUILD:STRING=NVPTX;AMDGPU;X86' '-DGCC_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_WITH_INSTALL_RPATH=1' '-DLLVM_ENABLE_PROJECTS:STRING=clang;clang-tools-extra;openmp;lldb;lld;compiler-rt;libcxx;libcxxabi;libunwind;polly' '/tmp/yzz/spack-stage/spack-stage-llvm-11.1.0-vumv7pwdrryveletq77q4gyajjdzyau6/spack-src/llvm'

4 errors found in build log:
     6     -- The ASM compiler identification is GNU
     7     -- Found assembler: /home/yzz/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc
     8     -- Detecting C compiler ABI info
     9     -- Detecting C compiler ABI info - failed
     10    -- Check for working C compiler: /home/yzz/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc
     11    -- Check for working C compiler: /home/yzz/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc - broken
  >> 12    CMake Error at /home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/cmake-3.20.1-z7aeuqkurkxlj4fna7p6q6sjstemhvea/share/cmake-3.20/Module
           s/CMakeTestCCompiler.cmake:66 (message):
     13      The C compiler
     14
     15        "/home/yzz/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc"
     16
     17      is not able to compile a simple test program.
     18

     ...

     24        make[1]: Entering directory '/tmp/yzz/spack-stage/spack-stage-llvm-11.1.0-vumv7pwdrryveletq77q4gyajjdzyau6/spack-build-vumv7pw/CMakeFiles/CMak
           eTmp'
     25        Building C object CMakeFiles/cmTC_ef855.dir/testCCompiler.c.o
     26        /home/yzz/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc    -o CMakeFiles/cmTC_ef855.dir/testCCompiler.c.o -c /tmp/yzz/spack-stage/spack-stage-llvm-11.1.0-vumv7p
           wdrryveletq77q4gyajjdzyau6/spack-build-vumv7pw/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp/testCCompiler.c
     27        Linking C executable cmTC_ef855
     28        /home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/cmake-3.20.1-z7aeuqkurkxlj4fna7p6q6sjstemhvea/bin/cmake -E cmake_link_script CMa
           keFiles/cmTC_ef855.dir/link.txt --verbose=1
     29        /home/yzz/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc CMakeFiles/cmTC_ef855.dir/testCCompiler.c.o -o cmTC_ef855
  >> 30    /home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/binutils-2.36.1-jdrlygkjalsohe2yhdlchwnixe4sngxo/bin/ld: fatal error: cannot use --p
           lugin: /home/yzz/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0/binutils-2.36.1-jdrlygkjalsohe2yhdlchwnixe4sngxo/bin/ld was compiled without
           plugin support
  >> 31        collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
  >> 32        make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/cmTC_ef855.dir/build.make:99: cmTC_ef855] Error 1
     33        make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/yzz/spack-stage/spack-stage-llvm-11.1.0-vumv7pwdrryveletq77q4gyajjdzyau6/spack-build-vumv7pw/CMakeFiles/CMake
           Tmp'
     34        make: *** [Makefile:127: cmTC_ef855/fast] Error 2
     35
     36
     37
     38

See build log for details:
  /tmp/yzz/spack-stage/spack-stage-llvm-11.1.0-vumv7pwdrryveletq77q4gyajjdzyau6/spack-build-out.txt
```

The `spec` of the packages is:
```
$ spack spec llvm ^python+tkinter
Input spec
--------------------------------
llvm
    ^python+tkinter

Concretized
--------------------------------
llvm@11.1.0%gcc@9.3.0~all_targets+clang~code_signing+compiler-rt~cuda~flang+gold+internal_unwind~ipo+libcxx+lld+lldb~llvm_dylib~mlir~omp_debug~omp_tsan+polly~python~shared_libs~split_dwarf build_type=Release cuda_arch=none arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake
    ^binutils@2.36.1%gcc@9.3.0+gold~headers~interwork~ld~libiberty~lto+nls~plugins arch=linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake
...
...
...
```
@naromero77  @trws Should be `+plugins`  of `binutils` enabled by default?

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2234-080d9b094f
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake
* **Concretizer:** original
```

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6325658/spack-build-out.txt)
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6325660/spack-build-env.txt)


<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
